thread.title: Erika Hitchman
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Erika Hitchman

author: Erika Hitchman
title: Erika Hitchman
text:
I was happy with my MOT but when they say local garage I thought it will be local. Instead of that it was Reading to Chessington and back what is over 2 hours drive and for Â£29 it was not cost effective but they used a lot of my fuel for sure so next time when Service Stop says local garage I will look more into it.
Except that service was good and the representative who collected my car was polite
